Literature.Title: Comparative functional properties of engineered cationic antimicrobial peptides consisting exclusively of tryptophan and either lysine or arginine.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=58µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MBC=22µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=28µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MBC=22µM)
